params.about_text: I'm tanish sharma from Jalandhar,punjab currently entered in my final year ,persuing btech in IT from Indian institute of information technology sonepat (IIITS). I have experience in multiple ml-ai and web dev projects and solved more than 800 dsa problems on sites like leetcode, codeforces, codechef. I have currently rating of 1700 in codechef, 1281 in codeforces and 1890 in leetcode. I have earned the tag of KNIGHT in leetcode solving 440+ dsa questions and given 20+ contests.
